INFP.name: The Mediator
INFP.description: Idealistic, empathetic, and introspective. INFPs are driven by their values and seek meaning and harmony in their lives. They are creative and often express themselves through art and writing.

ENFP.name: The Campaigner
ENFP.description: Enthusiastic, imaginative, and charismatic. ENFPs are curious about the world and enjoy exploring new ideas and possibilities. They are good at connecting with others and inspiring them with their vision.

INFJ.name: The Advocate
INFJ.description: Insightful, principled, and altruistic. INFJs are deeply concerned about the well-being of others and often take on a guiding role. They are creative problem-solvers who strive to make the world a better place.

ENFJ.name: The Protagonist
ENFJ.description: Charismatic, empathetic, and persuasive. ENFJs are natural leaders who are skilled at motivating and guiding others. They are driven by a strong sense of duty and a desire to help others reach their potential.

INTJ.name: The Architect
INTJ.description: Strategic, logical, and independent. INTJs are analytical thinkers who excel at long-term planning and problem-solving. They are driven by a desire to understand complex systems and improve them.

ENTJ.name: The Commander
ENTJ.description: Assertive, confident, and efficient. ENTJs are natural leaders who are skilled at organizing and directing people and resources. They are goal-oriented and thrive in challenging environments.

INTP.name: The Thinker
INTP.description: Analytical, intellectual, and innovative. INTPs are curious and love to explore theories and ideas. They are independent thinkers who enjoy solving complex problems and understanding how things work.

ENTP.name: The Debater
ENTP.description: Energetic, inventive, and argumentative. ENTPs are quick-witted and enjoy engaging in intellectual debates. They are always looking for new challenges and are not afraid to push boundaries and explore unconventional ideas.

ISFP.name: The Adventurer
ISFP.description: Artistic, spontaneous, and sensitive. ISFPs are in tune with their surroundings and enjoy experiencing life in a tactile, immediate way. They are compassionate and have a strong sense of aesthetics.

ESFP.name: The Entertainer
ESFP.description: Outgoing, energetic, and playful. ESFPs love being the center of attention and enjoy engaging with others in a lively, dynamic manner. They are spontaneous and thrive on excitement and new experiences.

ISTP.name: The Virtuoso
ISTP.description: Practical, observant, and adaptable. ISTPs are hands-on problem solvers who enjoy working with tools and exploring how things work. They are independent and enjoy taking things apart and putting them back together.

ESTP.name: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.description: Bold, perceptive, and action-oriented. ESTPs are energetic and enjoy taking risks and seizing opportunities. They are quick to make decisions and are skilled at navigating fast-paced environments.

ISFJ.name: The Defender
ISFJ.description: Loyal, practical, and compassionate. ISFJs are dedicated to helping others and excel at creating and maintaining order. They are reliable and often put the needs of others before their own.

ESFJ.name: The Consul
ESFJ.description: Warm, sociable, and organized. ESFJs are natural caregivers who enjoy supporting and nurturing others. They are detail-oriented and excel at managing social events and ensuring everyone feels included.

ISTJ.name: The Logistician
ISTJ.description: Responsible, meticulous, and dependable. ISTJs are practical and value tradition and order. They are thorough and methodical, excelling in roles that require attention to detail and reliability.

ESTJ.name: The Executive
ESTJ.description: Organized, direct, and confident. ESTJs are natural leaders who value structure and efficiency. They are decisive and excel at implementing plans and managing teams to achieve goals.
